fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space to surround the child inside the bounds of the button.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color of the button's background.

fields.name: disabledColor
fields.desc: The color of the button's background when the button is disabled.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: If [onPressed] and [onLongPress] callbacks are null, then the button will be disabled.

fields.name: minimumSize
fields.desc: The minimum size of the button.

fields.name: pressedOpacity
fields.desc: The opacity that the button will fade to when it is pressed. The button will have an opacity of 1.0 when it is not pressed.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: The radius of the button's corners when it has a background color.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the focus highlight for keyboard interactions.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.
